law.catch_line: Related services provided by local boards of education.
law.text: Local boards of education may contract to provide "related services" to exceptional children when the appropriate services are not available through a public or private agency.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 381, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 286, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 2.
